meanings.definition: A long, slender pin used to secure a hat to the head.
meanings.sent1: She carefully placed the hatpin through her hat to keep it in place.
meanings.sent2: The lady's hat stayed put thanks to the trusty hatpin.
meanings.sent3: When the mischievous cat mistook the hatpin for a toy, chaos ensued.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as sharp as a hatpin, piercing through any obstacles.
meanings.sent5: The gleaming hatpin sparkled in the sunlight, a delicate yet strong accessory.

meanings.definition: To fasten or secure a hat with a hatpin.
meanings.sent1: She had to hatpin her wide-brimmed hat on a windy day.
meanings.sent2: He hatpinned his fedora securely before heading out.
meanings.sent3: The magician hatpinned his hat so it wouldn't disappear along with the rabbit.
meanings.sent4: Her words hatpinned his attention, holding it captive.
meanings.sent5: The hatpinning process was crucial to ensure the hat stayed in place during the performance.
